description.en: AirSwap is a decentralized token exchange based on the Swap protocol whitepaper. Swap provides a decentralized trading solution based on a peer-to-peer design. The design solves two problems encountered in a peer-to-peer trading environment: counterparty discovery and pricing suggestions.

description.ko:
이더리움 기반의 블록체인1) 에서 진정한 의미의 P2P2) 생태계를 촉진하는 프로토콜

공정성에 중점을 둔 마찰이 적은 효율성이 높은 가치 네트워크를 지향하는 거래 플랫폼을 지향

P2P라는 블록체인으로 구현하기 최적화 된 방식에 집중하여 좀더 안전하고 효율적인 거래 플랫폼을 만드는 것이 Airswap 플랫폼의 목표입니다. 그리고 여기에 더해 오프체인 (블록체인 밖의)서비스로 인덱스를 제공하며 이것은 사용자들의 판매 구매 의사를 기반으로 구성된 정보입니다. 기존 방식의 블록체인보다 진일보 한 더욱 효율적인 거래를 위한 플랫폼이지만 Airswap이 암호화폐계에서 얼마나 큰 반향을 일으킬 수 있을지는 아직 조금 더 지켜봐야 한다는 입장이 지배적인 상황입니다.

status_updates.description:
Add your token, set your price. Delegates enable non-custodial, trustless limit order functionality and on-chain liquidity integrations on AirSwap. Check it out: 

https://medium.com/fluidity/introducing-airswap-delegates-1c3db83be1db

We’re excited to introduce our white-label solution for tokenized securities trading. Today, Securitize released a feature called Instant Access using this technology. For more information about tokenized securities and AirSwap, reach us at partners@airswap.io. 

https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-04-23/private-securities-trading-joins-the-digital-age-with-blockchain

AirSwap Explorer is now open-source. Clone it from GitHub to try it out locally. Contributions welcome! 

https://github.com/airswap/explorer

New integration guides are up! Check out how easy it is to build on AirSwap: 

https://docs.airswap.io/take-liquidity/run-an-aggregator

AirSwap contracts are now available on both Kovan and Goerli test networks. Come build on AirSwap today:

https://docs.airswap.io/system/contract-deployments

Learn how token projects like Synthetix, iExec, and Tellor, and more use AirSwap OTC to make trading safer for their communities:

https://medium.com/fluidity/token-projects-prefer-airswap-otc-cfa0105bf89a

New tokens can now be added to AirSwap and AirSwap OTC using the token’s contract address: 

https://airswap.io
